alert.note: Alert for McDonough (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 31 at 8:48PM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM TUESDAY TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Accumulations ranging from 8 to 12 inches possible Tuesday night through midday Thursday. * WHERE...McDonough County. * WHEN...From 9 PM Tuesday to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
